xs.description: Device: Portrait phones; Viewport: <576px; Columns 4; Margins: 16; Gutters 16

sm.description: Device: Landscape phones; Viewport: >=576px; Columns 4; Margins: 16; Gutters 16

md.description: Device: Tablets; Viewport: >=768px; Columns 8; Margins: 16; Gutters 16

lg.description: Device: Desktops; Viewport: >=992px; Columns 12; Margins: 16; Gutters 16

xl.description: Device: Large desktops; Viewport: >=1200px; Columns 12; Margins: 16; Gutters 16
